data.name: lblDisplayHeader.HelpText
data.value: This option enables displaying of a header text from a resource file ().

data.name: lblFilterAuthors.HelpText
data.value: With this option you can select authors whose articles and events will be displayed. Uncheck the option ‘Display articles from all authors’ to get the possibility for selecting categories.

data.name: lblModuleTheme.HelpText
data.value: Select a theme (design) for this module.

data.name: lblPermissionSource.HelpText
data.value: Depending on the selection, the module can inherit permissions from the EasyDNNnews module which are valid on the whole portal, or you can choose a module instance from which it will inherit permissions. Users will see only permitted articles in the calendar. If you select None, the module will not use permissions for the calendar.

data.name: lblSelectAuthors.HelpText
data.value: Select authors to include in search:

data.name: lblSelectAuthors.Text
data.value: Select authors to include in search:

data.name: lblSelectCategories.HelpText
data.value: With this option you can select categories from which articles and events will be displayed. Uncheck the option ‘Display all categories and subcategories’ to get the possibility for selecting categories.

data.name: lblSelectCategories.Text
data.value: Select categories to display articles from:

data.name: lblSelectDisplayStyle.HelpText
data.value: Select a display style for the selected theme.

data.name: lblSelectModule.HelpText
data.value: Select an instance of the main news module which will open all article details displayed in a calendar.

data.name: lblSelectModule.Text
data.value: Open article details in news module:

data.name: lblShowCalendar.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, the module will display a calendar. Depending on settings, the calendar can display articles and events by publish date or events by duration.

data.name: lblShowMonthArchiveModule.HelpText
data.value: Select an instance of the main news module which will open article details form the archive.

data.name: lblShowMonthArchiveModule.Text
data.value: Open details of articles from archive in module instance:

data.name: lblShowMonthlyArchive.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, the module will display an archive of articles organized by months or by years.

data.name: SelectArchive.Text
data.value: Please select calendar archive , monthly archive or events archive

data.name: lblNumberOfEvents.HelpText
data.value: Set a number of upcoming events which will be displayed.

data.name: lblShowEventArchive.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, the module will display an upcoming events box.

data.name: lblEventArticleOpen.HelpText
data.value: Select an instance of the main news module which will open article details from the archive.

data.name: lblEventArticleOpen.Text
data.value: Open details of articles in module instance:

data.name: lblLimitBackwordsEvents.HelpText
data.value: Set the criteria to display events whose start date has ended. The option 'Show all' will display all events, disregarding the fact that they have already ended. We can enter the number of days to be set in the past for past events in the field 'Limit to number of days in the past'. If the set value is 0, the criterion for the event's listing will be the current date. In that case, neither of the past events will be displayed.

data.name: liLimitNumber.Text
data.value: Limit to a number of days

data.name: lblPortalSharing.HelpText
data.value: This option allows for displaying of articles from other portals. Here you can select one or more portals from where articles will be displayed. In order to be able to receive articles from other portals, sharing of articles must be enabled in the portal that shares articles with this portal. Configure sharing of articles in Dashboard > Cross portal sharing

data.name: NoNewsInstance.Text
data.value: No News Instance, please add news module instance.

data.name: NoNewsInstancePortal.Text
data.value: No news instance with selected portal sharing. Please edit news module instance settings and set portal sharing.

data.name: NoSharingPortalInstance.Text
data.value: No news instance with selected portal sharing. Please edit news module instance settings and set portal sharing.

data.name: NoSharingPortalInstance2.Text
data.value: No News Instance, please add news module instance.

data.name: cvAuthorsTreeview.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please select at least one author.

data.name: cvCategoriesTreeview.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please select at least one category.

data.name: lblDisplayUpcomingEventsRSSlinks.HelpText
data.value: Here you can select a type of links which will be displayed with Upcoming events. Possible choices are Event RSS and iCalendar export.

data.name: lblSelectArticleEvents.HelpText
data.value: Using this option you can determine whether this instance of the calendar module will display only articles, only events or both. Events on a calendar can be labeled by duration (start to end date) or by publish date.

data.name: lblShowListLink.HelpText
data.value: Display link to the news instance to list articles.

data.name: lblShowNewsRSSLink.HelpText
data.value: Here you can select a type of a link which will be displayed with the calendar. Possible choices are news RSS, events RSS, Articles/ events list (link to a list of articles or events in the main EasyDNNnews module) and iCalendar export.

data.name: lblCalendarTooltipSummaryLenght.HelpText
data.value: Limit a number of characters from article summary which will be displayed in a tooltip. If the value is 0, then the whole summary is displayed.

data.name: lblCalendarTooltipSummaryLenght.Text
data.value: Limit length of article summary in tooltips:

data.name: lblCellHeight.HelpText
data.value: Here you can set a minimum height of a cell in pixels.

data.name: lblFirstDayOfTheWeek.HelpText
data.value: Choose a starting day of a week in the calendar.

data.name: lblHideUnlocalizedItems.HelpText
data.value: Articles without translation for a selected language won't be displayed. For example ,on a site with three different languages: English (default), German and Italian, an article is translated to Italian language. When selecting German language article won’t be visible because there is no translation. Hint: You can also turn off displaying articles on the default language. For articles that you do not want to show on the default language you need to go to Edit article > Content localization and Turn on option "Do not show articles on the default language".

data.name: lblHideUnlocalizedItems.Text
data.value: Do not show articles if they do not have translation for selected language:

data.name: lblIsTooltipEnabled.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, a tooltip with article details will be displayed on hover.

data.name: lblNumOfItemsInCell.HelpText
data.value: If the same day has more than one article, then here you can set a maximum number of articles which will be displayed in a cell. If the value is 0 then all the articles are displayed.

data.name: lblNumOfItemsInCell.Text
data.value: Limit number of articles per cell:

data.name: lblSelectCalendarType.HelpText
data.value: Choose between Simple and Advanced calendar.

data.name: lblTitleLenght.HelpText
data.value: Here you can limit the length of an article or event title in a calendar. If the value is 0, then there is no limit and the whole title is displayed.

data.name: lblTitleLenght.Text
data.value: Limit length of title in calendar:

data.name: lblUpcomingEventsToolTip.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, a tooltip with article details will be displayed on hover.

data.name: lblUpcomingEventsTTSummaryLenght.HelpText
data.value: Limit a number of characters of an article summary which will be displayed in a tooltip. If the value is 0, then it displays the whole summary.

data.name: lblUpcomingEventsTTSummaryLenght.Text
data.value: Limit length of article summary in tooltips:

data.name: lblIsSocialInstance.HelpText
data.value: Displays user's and group's articles on the Activity feed. The articles are filtered by the UserID or GroupID querystring. If this option is enabled and the querystring UserID or GroupID is missing, then the articles won't show up.

data.name: lblArchiveTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Choose a template for this module instance.

data.name: lblArchiveType.HelpText
data.value: Select an archive type. Possible selections are By month and By year. The option 'By month' groups articles by months and the option 'By year' groups by years.

data.name: lblArchiveFilterBy.HelpText
data.value: Using this option you can determine whether this instance of the calendar module will display only articles, only events or both. Events on a calendar can be labeled by duration (start to end date) or by publish date.

data.name: lblShowCalendarPortalTimeZone.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, then a portal time zone will be displayed.

data.name: lblShowUpcomingEventsPortalTimeZone.HelpText
data.value: If this option is enabled, then a portal time zone is displayed.

data.name: CalendarUserIDInLink.HelpText
data.value: Pass author userid in query string. This option is used by a DNN social profile.

data.name: CalendarUserIDInLink.Text
data.value: Pass userID querystring in article link:

data.name: UpcomingEventsUserIDInLink.Text
data.value: Pass userID querystring in article link:

data.name: lblModuleVisibility.HelpText
data.value: Here you can set when you want the module to be visible on the page. If the option 'Module always visible' is selected, the module is visible all the time. If the option 'Show module only when the news module displays the list of articles' is selected, the module will only be visible when the news module displays the list of articles, yet it won't be visible when article details are displayed. If the option 'Show module only when the news module displays article details' is selected, the module will only be visible when article details are displayed, yet it won't be visible when a list of articles is displayed. Note: The module is always visible to admin and host users.
